.. _system:

System
=============

.. image:: ./gs_system.png
   :width: 800
   :alt: Pre

**Mode** : There are three modes : *nao*, *fd* and *pw* (Default: *nao*).

**Basis** : There are five basis : *dzp*, *sz*, *dz*, *szp* and *pvalence.dz* (Default:*dzp*).

**Charge** : Give the appropriate charge of the molecular system (Default is 0 (zero) ).

**Multiplicity** : Give the multiplicity of the molecular system (Default is 1)
